review: As Good As Advertised, but I still haven't explored the voice feature, yet. I'll update the review later when I use the voice command feature. But, even without it, I would be completely satisfied. The device works wonderfully and streams flawlessly with Amazon Prime videos, NETFLIX & You Tube. I don't use any other services. I have it hooked-up to a stereo receiver, Yamaha RX-V477 - plugged into one of the HMDI ports in the back. I just select that HMDI on the remote and the display comes up. Selecting the options are user friendly. And, now I can play this on my Bose surround sound system. And, I'm doing all of this living overseas via a VPN.

review: I was finally convinced to purchase a fire tv by the addition of hbogo, as I would no longer need to boot up my PS3 to use it. Unfortunately the app lacks functionality on the Fire TV, specifically the watch list and season pass. This and the fact that "last played" rarely works, meaning I have to search for the series then find the next episode. These are admitted minor inconveniences, yet ones I don't have when using hbogo on PS3.I'm rather annoyed that I was finally convinced to buy a fire tv by the addition of hbogo, and now I'm back to watching it on my PS3 so I can get full functionality.
